phrases: It is getting lonelier and lonelier.
Does she really live in a place like this?
The lesser spirits said they saw someone who looked like Felt coming in this direction...
Hey, bro!
Does a girl named Felt live up this way?
Huh?
Felt?
Nothing that way but Old Man Rom's loot house.
Did Felt steal something from you guys?
Well, go try and negotiate to get it back.
Live strong.
Why do I have to pay money to get back something stolen from me?
Well, at any rate, leave this one to me.
I will negotiate with him.
Okay.
I will leave it to you.
You agreed to that awfully easily...
The way you have been acting, I thought you would say,
Leave this to a useless boy like you?
That is so ridiculous, I am laughing my head off!
And I would be hurt, but still make up my mind to help you all over again.
I would not say something that mean.
Of course, I would be lying if I said you have not been holding me back...
It would be a lie?!
But...
I will try believing in you.
If it actually goes well, I will consider it a bonus.
If you would look up at me and say,
Do your best for me!
I would feel a lot more motivated.
I cannot force myself to say something like that.
But... do your best.
Yeah.
I will.
I will go in first.
You stay outside and keep watch.
I will not be back too late, but you can have dinner without me.
Do not say dumb things like that.
Be careful.
Sure, sure.
Do not come in until I say it is okay, Satella.
What?
N-Nothing.
Never mind.
If you can get my insignia back, I will apologize.
Excuse me...
Now, am I walking into a demon nest or a snake pit?
In a fantasy world, either one is totally plausible...
This is all stolen loot?
And why is not there anyone here?
A place that handles stolen goods can only afford to be so careless.
Oh, dear, you found that?
Well, I have no choice, then.
Yes, I have no choice...
Ow, that burns...
Oh, crap...
Is all of this my blood?
This is bad...
Very bad...
Subaru?
What is wrong?
Subaru?
No... Run!
Hurry!
Wait there...
I am...
going to...
save you...
What is the matter, boy?
You look like you saw a ghost.
What?
I asked you about the appa.
The appa!
Do you even have money?
What?
Do not what me!
The appa!
Are you buying it or not?
Oh...
No, like I said, I am broke beyond compare...
The hell?
If you are just browsing, then move along.
I run a business here.
I do not have time for window-shoppers
What is going on?
Was not it just nighttime a minute ago?
The wound on my belly is gone...
Oh, right!
Satella!
Damn it, did not Puck ask me to take care of her?
I have to get back to that shop!
Hey, why do you look so spooked?
If you do not want to get hurt, cough up whatever you have got!
You guys...
Did you see I was alone and decide to get revenge?
Huh?
What are you talking about?
Are you nuts?
Do not worry about it.
Just leave everything you have got on the ground and we will let you go.
Okay, fine.
Everything I have got, huh?
I am in a hurry, so I do not even care.
Now act like a dog.
Get on all fours like a dog and howl, Help me!
Do not get cocky, bastard!
Whoa, there.
Do not underestimate a truant kid with too much free time.
After swinging a wooden sword around all the time for no reason,
my grip strength is over 70 kilograms!
I am in a hurry!
Do not get in my way again!
Do not freak out...
Do not freak out, do not freak out!
Am I stupid?
After coming this far, I cannot just leave without answers!
Is anyone there?
Someone...
Someone is in there, right?
Please, answer me!
Please!
Shut yer trap!
You tryin' to bust my door down when you do not
even know the signal or password?!
You are...
What are you all fidgety for?
Are your balls chafin' ya that much?
I am not worried about the position of my privates!
Do not start the conversation with potty humor!
You are already interrupting my evening booze.
You will kill me if you start talkin' about boring stuff now.
Do not drink while the sun's still up.
You will die young.
Actually, this is a dumb question, but...
Have you died recently?
Well, I admit I am an old man at death's door,
but I are not really died yet.
Okay, then have you seen a girl with silver hair?
Silver hair?
I are not seen anyone that conspicuous.
Was it all a dream?
Then exactly how much of it was a dream,
and why am I in this world?
So what are you doing here, anyway?
Oh... I am looking for an insignia.
It belongs to a silver-haired girl who helped me out.
I do not know why, but it is important to her.
I think she said it had a jewel in the center.
An insignia with a jewel...
Sorry, but I are not got anything like that.
Are you sure?
Try to think!
Maybe you are just old and senile?
If I cannot remember when I am at my best, with booze in me,
the only explanation is that I do not know it.
But...
I have got someone bringing in some goods later.
I am told it is some fine loot.
There is a good chance it could be what you are lookin' for.
Is the one bringing it in a girl named Felt?
What, you even know who swiped it?
Of course, whether you will be able to afford it is another matter.
I am as broke as they come, after all.
Are not no use talkin' about it, then.
No, there is the option of trading.
Now that you mention it, you have got some unusual stuff there.
That is right.
For example, this is a corn potage snack.
It is super tasty!
That is food?
I see!
What an odd flavor!
These would go great with booze!
Right?
Right?
Hey!
Do not just start eating them!
Well, I do not know what you plan to trade,
but you will have to come back after Felt gets here.
Mm, that is good!
I guess in any world, there are people with money, and people without.
It sure is easy to see the difference here.
Hey, what are you doing there?
You are in my way.
Felt!
You know me?
Of course I do!
I have been waiting for you!
What for?
Wait, are you saying you do not remember me?
Have we met?
You know, I am a busy woman, so I do not remember most people
I meet unless they leave a huge impression.
I would say that was a pretty huge impression...
Well, forget that.
I want to negotiate for the insignia you have.
Oh, so that is it, huh?
All right, I will hear you out.
For a rat...
Poison.
For a white whale...
A harpoon.
To the noble dragon lord, we are...
Shitbags.
Sorry to keep you waiting, Old Man Rom.
My target was more persistent than I thought.
It took a while to shake them.
Hey, Old Man Rom, did you water down this milk?
It is nasty.
Hey, I give you something outta the goodness of my heart, and you call it gross?
You two are closer than I had either hoped or expected.
I am feeling left out over here.
Do not talk like a wuss when you have got a face almost as scary as Old Man Rom's.
People have said many things to me,
but you tell me I can compete with this old guy?!
Okay, I went too far that time.
Sorry, Bro.
You two are not in some conspiracy to try to piss me off, are you?
Okay, well, why do not we get down to business?
How much will you pay for it?
You do not waste time...
Before I answer that, you do have the insignia, right?
Of course I do.
See?
This one's got a jewel in it,
so I had to work pretty hard to get it.
If you can pay enough to match my effort, we will both be happy.
I have no money.
Then we have nothing to discuss!
Tsk, tsk, tsk.
I do not have money, but I have things worth money.
What I have here is a
a cell phone!
What is that?
Never seen one of those before.
Take this!
Nine shots per second: Continuous Shot!
Whoa!
Hey!
What is that sound?!
And that was too bright!
Are you tryin' to kill me?!
Do not you go makin' light of this old man with dodgy tricks like that!
Now, hold on.
Is this...
Them's me and Felt's faces.
What sort of magic is that?
I told you, it is a mystical item that can freeze a moment in time.
With this, you can capture moments in time and store them in here.
I see!
That is amazing!
Never seen the like.
Is that one of the metia I have been hearing about lately?
Metia?
It is the name for devices that let us people who have not
opened the gate use magic, like real magic users.
I am more concerned with the price.
What can I get out of this metia?
Well, it is my first time using a metia, too.
But I would say there is no doubt it will fetch more than that insignia.
Then that settles it!
This cell phone for the insignia!
Negotiations complete!
Hey!
Nope.
Not yet.
Why not?!
You are not the only one I am negotiating with for this.
Huh?
Besides, I nabbed this insignia because I was asked to.
My client told me I could get ten holy coins for it.
You already had a deal with the one you stole it for?
I do not know what ten holy coins would be worth, but...
That metia you have got would be worth at least twenty holy coins...
No, there are probably fanciers out there who would pay more for a thing like that.
Really?!
That means I can get away with overcharging for it!
So, when and where are you meeting your client?
Do not worry.
Negotiations will be held here.
If a little thing like me dealt with them alone,
I would be sunk if a client decided to bilk on me.
But I do not have to worry with Old Man Rom here.
Do they know the password?
Oh, I did not mention it.
That is probably for me.
I will go check.
You are okay with letting her use you like that?
Well, it are not like we are total strangers.
I have known her a long time, so I will help her out.
You know, even I have to give a wry chuckle at the sight
of someone looking like such a barbarian.
Well, look at where we are.
Everyone around here is desperate just to survive.
It is common for youngsters to join forces with others
in similar situations to keep themselves alive.
But Felt are not cut out for that.
That is why I got to look out for her.
I was right.
It was for me.
Over here.
Care to sit down?
There seem to be several outsiders here.
Well, I would be in trouble if you bilked on me.
We weaklings have our own brand of smarts.
I know this older fellow, but who is the young man?
This guy's your rival.
He is the other person negotiating with me.
I see.
I understand the situation now.
So that means you two will be bidding against each other.
I do not really care who gets the insignia,
so I will sell it to the highest bidder.
I think I like that personality of yours.
So how much did this young man bid?
I am putting up this metia.
It is a rare item, probably the only one of its kind in this world.
That muscleman tells me it is worth no less than twenty holy coins.
A metia...
As it happens, the client sent me with some extra funds.
Just so I would be prepared to sweeten the deal.
The client...
So you were asked to fetch it, too?
That is right.
The client is the one who wants it.
Would you happen to be in the same business?
Being in the same business as me would mean they are unemployed!
So, this unemployed guy has named a price that puts him far in the lead.
What price is your master putting on it?
Twenty exactly.
These are all the holy coins my employer sent with me.
Is it not quite enough?
You are a man!
Do not make that pathetic face!
I told you, your metia is worth no less than twenty...
As I see it, victory in this deal is leaning toward the boy.
Sorry for you and your employer, but you would better bag up those coins and leave.
Yes!
Wh-What?
What is wrong with a little victory pose?
I am psyched!
No one said anything.
Go as crazy as you want.
I do not care, as long as I get my profit.
Uh, sorry, Elsa-san.
You will probably get in trouble, huh?
It cannot be helped.
It was my employer's fault for trying to underpay.
Well, this deal ended in disappointment for me,
but I will be taking my leave now.
By the way, what do you intend to do with that insignia?
Oh, I am going to find its owner and return it to her.
Oh...
You are with them, then.
Wh-What?
Do you want to die?!
Oh, my.
You dodged my strike.
This is my first battle to the death with a giant!
Quiet, little girl!
I will grind you up and feed you to the rats!
This is bad!
Do not worry.
There is no way Old Man Rom will lose.
Take this!
Old Man Rom!
Damn it!
I forgot to say...
I can at least take you with me!
Thank you for the milk.
I will return this.
You bitch...
How dare you?
Oh?
It seems you have more courage than your friend there.
But if you resist, you might very well get hurt.
I will kill you, even if you do not fight back, you psychopath!
If you move around, my hands might slip.
I am quite rough at handling blades, you see.
Sorry you got caught up in this.
Blessing of the Wind.
How wonderful.
I can see you are loved by this world.
I envy you!
The old man and the girl have fallen, yet you are not moving.
Have you given up?
D-Damn it...
Ah, you finally stood up.
It is less fun since you took so long, but still, not bad.
It is no use, though.
I can see you are a novice, and your movements are rough.
You have no blessings or techniques.
I would hoped I could squeeze wisdom out of you, but you lack that, too.
Shut up!
I do have my pride!
After you put me through all this...
I do acknowledge that you have extraordinary determination.
If only you could have done that sooner,
things might have gone differently for these two.
I think it is time to end this.
I will send you to meet the angels.
Ah... I certainly felt that one.
Are you surprised?
I opened up your belly when we passed by one another.
This is the one thing I excel at.
As I thought...
Your guts have such a lovely color!
It hurts...
It hurts...
It hurts...
It hurts...
It hurts...
It hurts...
Does it hurt?
Are you suffering?
It... does not hurt?
In pain?
Sad?
Do you want to die?
Die?
Am I dead?
Am I still alive?
When will I die?
When will I die?
Slowly, slowly, slowly, slowly...
I am scared... I am scared...
I am scared!
I am scared!
I am scared!
I am going to die!
I am going to die!
I am going to die!
Yes, you are slowly losing body heat...
You are slowly growing cold...
Oh... I am dead.
What is the matter, boy?
You look like you saw a ghost.
Boy?
You okay?
I have no idea what is going on anymore...
Are you okay, boy?
Here, forget about the money.
Just take these.
Hey... Wait...
Wait!
Please, wait!
Wait!
Satella!
Please do not ignore me!
My dying and not doing what you said were my fault!
But I was desperate!
I went back to the loot house after that, but I could not find you...
I am sorry for only thinking of myself.
But I am glad you are all right, Satella.
What are you thinking?
I do not know who you are,
but do not call me by the name of the Jealous Witch!
What are you thinking?!
The End of the Begin ning and the Beginning of the End
